file_insights.changes_summary: Added comprehensive cell-by-cell correction UI with editing capabilities for board extraction results
key_modifications: Added editing state for board and domino results
Implemented cell selection and editing mechanisms
Created callbacks for modifying cell states, domino pip values, and constraints
Added visual indicators for cell selection
Introduced reset and accept methods for edited results

patterns_discovered: State management for editable extraction results
Immutable state updates using spread and map operations
Flexible editing of grid-based data structures
Callback-driven UI interaction for manual corrections
gotchas_discovered: Complex logic for updating grid strings (shape and regions)
Need to handle edge cases in pip and cell value editing
Maintaining consistency between visual representation and underlying data
recommendations: Add comprehensive unit tests for editing logic
Consider extracting complex editing logic into separate utility functions
Implement input validation for all editing operations
Add accessibility features for manual correction UI
